name: Gnome Place Like Home (spencer.qunne)
description:
Gnome Place Like Home is a simple virtual reality game where you protect the cosmic Gnome Island from the threat of weeds. With your help, the roots might just reach the Galactic Wellspring, and save gnome society.  Created in 36 hours for Global Game Jam 2023 by the UF Digital Worlds MiDAS Cohort of 2023.

The free APK file is playable on Meta Quest VR headsets. 

Made with sounds by ZapSplat and a skybox by Avionix.

Created with ❤️ by Justin Gast, Spencer Henry, Logan Kemper, Juan Lam, and Kalli Melilli.
